name: Princess Mermaid Simulator 3D
description: Play the new Mermaid Simulator 3D - Sea Animal Attack Games and get to experience the wildlife at its finest. Feel like a hungry Mermaid, explore underwater swimming in the ocean and searching for food! Hunt for fish in the ocean or find a prey on the beach! People are swimming around and waiting for angry Mermaid attack! Find food to survive with this mermaid world game, mind your health and energy rate and enjoy amazing underwater views!
